Description: B.C. Rich Class Axe USA Wrath. From my personal collection of rare axes, I offer this gem, with a HEAVY heart. Mahogany body, maple neck AND fretboard. Dimarzio hums, sperzel machines, kahler trem. This beast was assembled and set up at the B.C. Rich custom shop on Mt Bethel road, Warren, New Jersey in 1992. One of less than 250 produced BY B.C. RICH. I am not interested in haggling, I will NOT end the auction early, nor entertain banter concerning lowering the price. If you are serious about wanting to bid, you probably know that you have stumbled across a rare opportunity to obtain something special from the history of a great company that I have always loved. If you have any questions, want more information, pictures etc, please contact me via the eBay relay, or on Facebook, bc rich no nonsense classifieds, ( eric of the mc6) thank you for taking time to look at my goods. Shipped by way of Ups ground.On Jan-26-19 at 15:13:18 PST, seller added the following information: Check out my other listings, for more insanity! Also, bid with confidence, I have been buying and selling guitars around the world for a number of years. They get packaged by me for shipping as they were my own flesh and blood. Very well protected.
Title: B.C. Rich Class Axe USA Wrath
